00048 bool VhdlPortSorter::operator<( const VhdlPortSorter& other ) const {
00049 
00050         // first check the interface name
00051         if (interface_.compare(other.interface_, Qt::CaseInsensitive) == 0) {
00052                 
00053                 // compare the direction and then the name
00054                 if (direction_ == other.direction_) {
00055                         return name_.compare(other.name_, Qt::CaseInsensitive) < 0;
00056                 }
00057                 else {
00058                         return direction_ < other.direction_;
00059                 }
00060         }
00061         else {
00062                 return interface_.compare(other.interface_, Qt::CaseInsensitive) < 0;
00063         }
00064 
00065 }
